title: Terry Biviano attends Lego event with her daughter Azura Minichiello
text:
She's an NRL WAG, footwear designer and socialite known for her glamourous red carpet appearances.

But on Wednesday, Terry Biviano took time off her busy schedule to enjoy a day out with her daughter Azura Minichiello at the LEGO Play Her Way event in Sydney.

The 45-year-old was all smiles as she spent time with the five-year-old at the event, designed to focus on empowering young girls.

Twinning! WAG Terry Biviano doted on her daughter Azura Minichiello at the LEGO Play Her Way event in Sydney on Wednesday

Fun and games: Terry was all smiles as spent time with her daughter at the event, designed to focus on empowering young girls.

The WAG looked casual chic in a pink one shoulder top and a pair of blue jeans.

She tied her brunette locks off her face and opted for minimal accessories, wearing a set of pearl earrings.

Terry accessorised her stylish ensemble with a pair of nude stilettos and a shoulder bag.

Style: Terry looked casual chic wearing a pink one shoulder top and a pair of blue jeans while Azura wore a matching coloured jumpsuit

Meanwhile, Azura looked adorable wearing a matching coloured jumpsuit, a pair of pink shoes and a bow in her hair.

She appeared to be enjoying her time with her mother as she sat beside her and played with LEGO blocks.

Terry outing comes two months after she returned from an idyllic vacation in Saint-Tropez on the star-studded French Riviera.

Holidays: Terry outing comes two months after she returned from an idyllic vacation in Saint-Tropez on the star-studded French Riviera

During the trip, the mother-of-one showed off her figure in a plunging Dior swimsuit, while posing on the side of a yacht.

Terry posed for an Instagram snap while sailing near Pampelone Beach, writing in the caption: 'Boat Dayz #takemeback.'

The brunette also shared a snap alongside her husband, retired rugby league star, Anthony Minichiello, who she married in 2012.
description: She's an NRL WAG, footwear designer and socialite known for her glamourous red carpet appearances.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
